data.name: Mortis Chronicles: Tale of Cowardice
data.detailed_description:
With mighty demons at the gates, there’s no time to waste! Assemble your party and sharpen your strategical turn-based battle skills in this refreshing take on the classics.

There’s Layers to this Game!



Gain an advantage over your enemies by manipulating the turn-based order. Use unique skills like Pressure to obtain more turns, Heal and Revive to stay in the fight, and Confuse your opponents by disabling their attacks!

Boost Your Attacks



Use boosts to unleash powerful special effects such as Taunt, to provoke your enemies in targeting specific party members, and Expose, to know your opponents' weaknesses and what attacks will work best!

Master Your Skills



Build your skill tree, learn new tricks, and upgrade current spells using Class Mastery Points, earned after the toughest of bouts. Learn to break enemy shields by embracing the Stagger effect, and put your hard earned rest into learning your team’s strengths and weaknesses.

Explore a Beautiful World



Wander across gorgeous planes, Mortis’ astonishing architecture, and explore the Five Guilds to learn the stories of our battle-scarred characters. Become attached to Mortis and its inhabitants as this world rich in lore is turned upside-down - its fate now resting solely on your shoulders.

You won’t be the Only One with Tricks Up Your Sleeves!



Be careful though - some enemies have their own Unique Abilities! Stay vigilant, and make sure to dodge these conniving curveballs, as even the smallest of mistakes can cause a permanent end to you and your party.

data.short_description: A 2D turn-based RPG set in a mythical world where humans and demons collide! Conjure powerful spells, master unique skill trees, and strategically dictate the fate of each fight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
